name: Tanya Marie WILSON, Vera Ward, Bonnie Sue Gates and Vickie Edwards, Petitioners, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania
docket_number: Appeal No. 23 M. D. Allocatur Docket 1982

parties: Tanya Marie WILSON, Vera Ward, Bonnie Sue Gates and Vickie Edwards, Petitioners, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Petition for allowance of appeal granted. Convictions for violation of 18 Pa.C.S. § 5902 vacated and judgments of sentence affirmed, Pa.Super., 442 A.2d 760.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
447 A.2d 1381
Tanya Marie WILSON, Vera Ward, Bonnie Sue Gates and Vickie Edwards, Petitioners, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 6, 1982.
